alert.note: Alert for Bristol; Newport (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 5:38AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Dukes, southwestern Barnstable, southern Plymouth, Bristol, eastern Newport and east central Bristol Counties through 630 AM EDT... At 538 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gosnold, or 9 miles southeast of Dartmouth, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. Torrential rain that may result in minor street flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Little to no impact from hail is expected. Locations impacted include... New Bedford, Fall River, Plymouth, Taunton, Dartmouth, Falmouth, Marion, Tisbury, Middleborough, Wareham, Sandwich, Bourne, Somerset, Fairhaven, Swansea, Tiverton, Westport, Mashpee, Raynham and Rehoboth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.
